pawarenne guruwarun wana obatayi saundarya upadhidharinta guru pathwim pradanaya kirime uleledi janadhipathiwaraya pawasayi 3174 denakuta ekawara pathwim labadena ithihasaye prathama awasthawa meyayi - amathi bandhula gunawardhana jathiya godanagime wagakima himiwanne ada pathwim labana obatayi - janadhipathi lekam lalith wirathunga anura balasuriya - udeni chandrasiri daruwan yahamagata ganime bharadura karyabharaya pawarenne guruwarun wana obata bawin ee yuthukama ratata, samajayata, itukaranu athayi dadise wishwasa karana bawa janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha sandahan kaleya.
